structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Dormitories; Nonsmoking Rooms; Rules And Regulations
law.text: Each public institution of higher education which provides housing for students in dormitories shall establish rules and regulations providing that a certain number of dormitory rooms shall be reserved for nonsmokers. Each such public institution shall provide a space on the application for admission or student housing for the applicant to indicate whether he would prefer to reside in a room where smoking was prohibited or whether he would prefer to reside in a room where smoking was allowed.
